1.0.name: wordpress/iflickr
1.0.description:
This plugin allows your users to easily download Flickr photos that are licensed under Creative Commons to the local server for attaching to posts.

Features include: * Customizable Attribution Text * Custom CSS class on Attribution & Image * Downloads the image to your server * Custom naming of image filename and alt text * Two ways to search - from within the sidebar and from Add Media

NOTE: This plugin requires PHP5.
